content.1: And after Abimelech there arose to defend Israel Tola the son of Puah, the son of Dodo, a man of Issachar; and he dwelt in Shamir in mount Ephraim.
content.2: And he judged Israel twenty and three years, and died, and was buried in Shamir.
content.3: And after him arose Jair, a Gileadite, and judged Israel twenty and two years.
content.4: And he had thirty sons that rode on thirty ass colts, and they had thirty cities, which are called Havoth-jair unto this day, which
content.5: And Jair died, and was buried in Camon.
content.6: And the children of Israel did evil again in the sight of the
content.8: And that year they vexed and oppressed the children of Israel: eighteen years, all the children of Israel that
content.9: Moreover the children of Ammon passed over Jordan to fight also against Judah, and against Benjamin, and against the house of Ephraim; so that Israel was sore distressed.
content.10: And the children of Israel cried unto the
content.12: The Zidonians also, and the Amalekites, and the Maonites, did oppress you; and ye cried to me, and I delivered you out of their hand.
content.13: Yet ye have forsaken me, and served other gods: wherefore I will deliver you no more.
content.14: Go and cry unto the gods which ye have chosen; let them deliver you in the time of your tribulation.
content.15: And the children of Israel said unto the
content.16: And they put away the strange gods from among them, and served the
content.17: Then the children of Ammon were gathered together, and encamped in Gilead. And the children of Israel assembled themselves together, and encamped in Mizpeh.
